text: Never So Few is a 1959 American World War II action movie directed by John Sturges and based on the 1957 novel of the same name by Tom T. Chamales. It stars Frank Sinatra, Gina Lollobrigida, Peter Lawford, Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, Brian Donlevy and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1959 movies Category:1950s action movies Category:American action movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by John Sturges
title: Never So Few
